TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LocalizationExtenderProvider extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider, class System.IDisposable
Public Class LocalizationExtenderProvider Implements IDisposable, IExtenderProvider
public ref class LocalizationExtenderProvider : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Use CodeDomLocalizationProvider instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 對根設計工具提供當地語系化 (Localization) 功能的設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support for localization features to a root designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以擴充與一組屬性和方法，以支援.NET Framework 當地語系化架構。 can extend an with a set of properties and methods that provide support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 如需詳細資訊使用的資源，請參閱[當地語系化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md)。For more about using resources, see [Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/localization.md). 當地語系化支援架構可讓設計工具，可初始化元件使用的資源檔，您可以在執行階段以支援各種不同的語言、 文化特性特定樣式及動態的可設定功能交換的內容。The localization support architecture enables designers to initialize component properties using resource files that can be swapped at run time to support a variety of languages, culture-specific styles and dynamically configurable features. 您可以使用這個類別的方法，讓設計工具和程式碼產生序列化程式，從資源載入和建置使用當地語系化功能的初始化程式碼。You can use the methods of this class to enable designers and code generating serializers to load from resources and build initialization code that uses localization features. 隨附於 Visual Studio 的預設序列化程式已能夠當地語系化元件和控制項，但它們才能進行這些找出.NET Framework 當地語系化架構的支援。The default serializers that ship with Visual Studio are already capable of localizing components and controls, but they only do so if they locate support for the .NET Framework localization architecture. 若要偵測的當地語系化支援存在，序列化系統必須找出公用根設計工具元件上名為"Localizable"的屬性。To detect the presence of localization support, the serialization system must locate a public property named "Localizable" on the root designer component. 如果序列化程式會發現這個屬性，它會搜尋屬性的型別名為"Language"，以判斷目前的資源設定。If a serializer finds this property, it searches for a property of type named "Language" to determine the current resource configuration. 預設序列化程式會使用這些屬性來判斷如果它應該當地語系化的元件，任何可當地語系化的資源，而且如果是，什麼格式應該在儲存的資源資訊。Default serializers use these properties to determine if it should localize any localizable resources of the component, and if so, what format the resource information should be saved in. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將元件。The following code example adds a to a component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例包含範例元件和設計工具。The following code example includes an example component and designer. 在設計工具會使用新增元件的當地語系化支援屬性。The designer uses a to add localization support properties for the component. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 指定元件的服務提供者。

span.span: A service provider for the specified component.

param.name: baseComponent
param.span: 要當地語系化的基底元件。

span.span: The base component to localize.

summary.span: 使用指定服務提供者 (Provider) 和基底元件，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified service provider and base component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，新將目前的語言設定為，這是泛型，且預設的語言資源設定。By default, a new sets the current language to , which is the generic and default language resource setting. 這項設定會導致設計工具產生程式碼與參考的泛用的語言資源。This setting causes a designer to generate code that references the generic language resource. 您可以建立其他物件來代表，並找出其他當地語系化的程式可以在執行階段使用的資源資料。You can create other objects to represent and identify other localized resource data that a program can use at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新物件。The following code example creates a new object. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 處置 (Dispose) 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回目前用來存取指定之物件的資源資料的資源文化特性。This method returns the current resource culture used to access resource data for the specified object.

span.span: Resets the resource culture for the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的物件已初始化與當地語系化的資源，設計工具載入時，這個方法會設定指定之物件的資源文化特性資源文化特性，用來載入設計工具時，初始化指定之物件的值。If the specified object was initialized with localized resources when the designer loaded, this method sets the resource culture for the specified object to the resource culture used to initialize the values of the specified object when the designer loaded. 如果指定的物件不有任何先前的資源的文化特性設定，設定為目前的文化特性資源。If the specified object had no previous resource culture setting, the current resource culture is set to .
